usa: The Italian explorer Giovanni da Verrazzano landed in the neighborhood of Chesapeake Bay<sup id="cite_ref-The_Powhatan_Confederacy_page_129_4-0" class="reference">[4]</sup><sup id="cite_ref-jstor.org_5-0" class="reference">[5]</sup> and explored the Atlantic coast of North America from Florida to New Brunswick including New York Bay and Narrangansett Bay.
